titles.title: Indian Gaming Tax Reform Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the unrelated business income tax shall apply to the gaming activities of Indian tribes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Indian Gaming Tax Reform Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to to provide that the unrelated business income tax shall apply to the gaming activities of any Indian tribal organization, subject to an exception.
